title: Four Murders In Northern Ireland:  Episode 76
description: Northern Ireland, 1991\.   Despite the political conflict, people still got on with living their daily lives.  Margaret Perry, at 26, had everything to live for when she was murdered: an innocent victim of a wider struggle.  This episode look at the life and death of Margaret Perry.
